price: Munãfukai maza da munãfukai mãtã, sãshensu* daga sãshe, sunã umurni da abin ƙi kuma sunã hani daga alhẽri. Kuma sunã damƙẽwar hannayensu. Sun mance Allah, sai Ya mantã da su. Lalle ne munãfukai sũ ne fãsiƙai.
arabic: ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتُ بَعۡضُهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡضٖۚ يَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَقۡبِضُونَ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡۚ نَسُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَنَسِيَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
footnotes: * sũ duka daidai suke ga hãlinsu na sharri. Damƙe hannu shi ne rõwa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-munāfiqūna wal-munāfiqātu baʿḍuhum min baʿḍin yamurūna bil-munkari wayanhawna ʿani al-maʿrūfi wayaqbiḍūna aydiyahum nasū al-laha fanasiyahum inna al-munāfiqīna humu al-fāsiqūna
